author: mursoi3294
content: I came to understand that this server is for protocol development and research,  I humbly request@piper@micah to guide on how etherium stack exchange works or how do I transact with ether

author: sky.cactus
content: This isn't really the right place to learn the basics of how to use Ethereum.  I recommend looking up tutorials on the internet for the basics of Ethereum.  You can start at https://ethereum.org
